name: Falnarion Tactics II- Beneath The Windfelt Dreams
detailed_description:
Help support Falnarion Tactics II. Doing so will give you access to four music files;

1. Beneath The Windfelt Dreams (Falnarion Tactics II Main Theme).

2. Wild Flower (Falnarion Tactics II Main Battle Theme).

3. Breezing Through (Falnarion Tactics II Shop Theme).

4. Hopeful Horizon (Falnarion Tactics II Victory Theme).

As a special thank you!
about_the_game:
Help support Falnarion Tactics II. Doing so will give you access to four music files;

1. Beneath The Windfelt Dreams (Falnarion Tactics II Main Theme).

2. Wild Flower (Falnarion Tactics II Main Battle Theme).

3. Breezing Through (Falnarion Tactics II Shop Theme).

4. Hopeful Horizon (Falnarion Tactics II Victory Theme).

As a special thank you!
short_description: Donate to Team Syukino and receive four beautifully composed songs by Sebastien Romero for Falnarion Tactics II.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: DLC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: DLC

legal_notice:
Falnarion Tactics II is the sole property of Team Syukino.
*The drawing of "Tolem Felstein" is also the copyrighted property of Team Syukino*
